getCustomDateFormat

public static String getCustomDateFormat(Environment env,
                                         boolean input,
                                         String defaultValue)
Provides the date format specified in the configuration. If no format is specified in configuration then, for convenience, the provided default format parameter is returned. The parameter input specifies whether the date format is for date input or output.

Parameters:
env - The Environment to use for searching configuration.
input - Whether the date pattern is for inputting or outputting the value.
defaultValue - The format to return when format is not specified in configuration.
Returns:
The found format or the default value.
Since:
2.0

getCustomTimeFormat

public static String getCustomTimeFormat(Environment env,
                                         boolean input,
                                         String defaultValue)
Provides the time format specified in the configuration. If no format is specified in configuration then, for convenience, the provided default format parameter is returned. The parameter input specifies whether the time format is for time input or output.

Parameters:
env - The Environment to use for searching configuration.
input - Whether the time pattern is for inputting or outputting the value.
defaultValue - The format to return when format is not specified in configuration.
Returns:
The found format or the default value.
Since:
2.0
